title: About Me
content: About Me #  Hi, my name is Derek Farr. Thanks for visiting my website.

title: About This Site
content:
About This Site #  This site is a basic exemplar of the Jamstack. It uses:
 Hugo as a static site generator Hugo Book as a theme for Hugo GitHub to host the source code repository Netlify CMS as a “headless” CMS Netlify for hosting and CI/CD  More information
For a helpful guide to building sites like this—with Jamstack architecture and headless CMS—see this article on stackbit.com.
